resources.string:
The Puzzler is an interesting collections of popular puzzles and riddles. Solving them will be a funny yet intellectual drive for you.

More on the app can be found at http://netrananda.com/thepuzzler.Have fun!!

Each level contains 10 puzzles. A right answer awards you 10 points. Every answer is just a single word.To assist you in solving the puzzle, there are two type of hint.
Hint 1 is logical. Viewing it deducts 2 points from your score.
Hint 2 reveals some of the letters from the answer word. Viewing it deducts 3 points.
If you are desparate to know the answer for a puzzles/riddles that you could not solve, there is an option to view it. However we encouarge you to excercise your brain a bit before giving up.
Have fun testing your IQ!!
